response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I suggest we discuss a fair price that reflects both its worth and your needs. Considering the product's intrinsic value to you is estimated at $150, I propose an offer of $120. This allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if this proposal works for you, or if you have any suggestions for a different price.", "product_price": 120}
